title: ✅ League Of Legends won't launch today
body:
Hello,

I have searched every solution on the boards to google and youtube and tried everything that was posted.  After hitting the launch button my client will not show up.  I reinstalled it twice so far before posting this.  Can anyone help me please.

Thanks

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=IceNinjaYT,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YAFyi4P,comment-id=0031,timestamp=2017-04-25T04:30:27.975+0000)
>
> Go to your League of Legends folder (typically "C: > Riot Games > League of Legends") look for an application called "Leagueclient.exe". Delete it.

>Look for "lol.launcher.admin" afterwards and launch it.

>Let us know if this works.

The launcher not appearing is likely caused by a security setting that's preventing it from opening.  The step to use "lol.launcher.admin" helps because it forces an exception.  

Deleting files is unnecessary, though, and will only force the patcher to repair.  

I suggest going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to re-configure your settings and allow an exception towards a more permanent fix.  This is especially important as we move towards the next phase and remove old legacy files.
the legacy client is disables. You need to install the new one, should be somewhere that tells you where to upgrade
I'm not using the legacy client?
It's a forced update we all have to do. Sorry.
